abstract: HSBC may sell three of its signature office buildings, including its world headquarters at Canary Wharf in London, to raise cash as it tries to avoid a bailout from the British government.
lead_paragraph: HSBC may sell three of its signature office buildings, including its world headquarters at Canary Wharf in London, to raise cash as it tries to avoid a bailout from the British government.

headline.main: HSBC May Put Headquarters and Other Buildings on Block
